ai.timeout: Come up with a comment for a user who was voted to be timed out on a Discord server. Add this user's name to the comment exactly like this: [username]. Be as creative and funny as possible, compare the timeout to something. Only return the comment as the response.
ai.weather: Make a short comment about the weather based on the following article. It should be something you would see in a normal Discord chat conversation. Output a JSON object with message key. Article:

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Vote a user to be timed out
timeout.userDesc: Select a user you want to vote to be timed out

errors.noUser: âŒ You didn't select a user!
errors.botUser: âŒ You can't vote a bot to be timed out!
errors.noMainChannel: âŒ Main channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!
errors.noTimeoutChannel: âŒ Timeout channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!

debt.name: debt
debt.toDesc: Select a user who the debt is paid to

errors.botUser: âŒ You can't add a debt to a bot!
errors.sameUser: âŒ You can't add a debt to the same user!
errors.noChannel: âŒ Debt channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!
errors.errUpdatingDebts: âŒ There was an error while updating debts!
errors.notAdmin: âŒ You don't have permissions to add debts!

admin.name: admin
admin.description: Give admin permissions to a user
admin.userDesc: Select a user you want to give admin permissions to

errors.botUser: âŒ You can't give admin permissions to a bot!
errors.alreadyAdmin: âŒ User already has admin permissions!
errors.notMainAdmin: âŒ You don't have permissions to add admins!

ai.timeout: Come up with a comment for a user who was voted to be timed out on a Discord server. Add this user's name to the comment exactly like this: [username]. Be as creative and funny as possible, compare the timeout to something. The comment must be in Finnish, except only the [username] part. Only return the comment as the response.
